name: AskPandaNewsAssistant
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get the latest news about China from Ask Panda your Smart Audio news assistant. You only need to say: "Alexa, play my flash briefing," or "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" and it will be broadcast automatically. No other actions are necessary.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
